answers.answer: Haha funny you said that. I drank the lemon lime with my 1st pregnancy for both my 1 hr and 3hr test and couldnt drink sprite for like almost 3 years :) smelling sprite made me wanna puke lol I just recently tried sprite again
Good luck with your 3 hr by the way!! :)
I got the fruit punch one with my 3hr. That was tasty! Good luck!
I hate that darn test. I had gestational diabetes with my first. I wanted to punch the nurse because I was hungry and the lady next to me because she was being a cry baby
Started my 3 hr 30 min ago. I feel a little lightheaded after the drink. I had the fruit punch flavor, it wasn't too bad. Good luck with your results.

My test went well. Played alot of cards to pass the time with my hubby. Get results in a week or so. Hoping for good results. I felt fine after drinking the stuff until about 3.5hrs later I got the shakes and sweat like crazy. Eating protein after helps though.
I had the orange one it taste like orange soda  with my 1st child and I'm gonna drink the same one

question: Just started my 3 hr glucose test. Gonna be a long day! Fyi if you ever need this test, drink the lemon lime glucose drink. Tastes just like sprite! Way better than the orange one they give u the 1 hr test.
title: 3 hr glucose
